name: Super Fast Slime Boi
description:
You are Blu, a young slime with one goal: carry its flag from here to there

If you die while carrying your flag, you go back to the start, but you can also plant your flag to create a checkpoint

But don't forget, you HAVE to carry your flag to the end. 

Can you carry your flag to the finish line? How many times will you die before it can?

Controls

AD/ ← →Move left and rightSpacebarJumpEPick Up/Plant Flag
